DOCNAME: CASE OF KUZMIN AND OTHERS v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Fair hearing)
TEXT: CARDINAL . All the applicants were parties to civil proceedings in which the firstinstance and appeal courts found in their favour . These judgments became binding and enforceable but were subsequently quashed by the supervisory review courts on the grounds of incorrect application of substantive law or incorrect assessment of evidence by lower courts ( for more details see the Appendix ) .
